86.eng-name: Limits and Punishments set by Allah (Hudood)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ash Shaibani:I asked `Abdullah bin Abi `Aufa, 'Did Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) carry out the Rajam penalty ( i.e., stoning to death)?' He said, "Yes." I said, "Before the revelation of Surat-an-Nur or after it?" He replied, "I don't Know

chapter.eng-name: The Rajm of a married person
